item.title: Help plz ! anyone!
item.dc:creator: @guthan38 guthan38
item.description:
@guthan38 wrote:

Edit the items in shops by going to shops.cfg, and make npcs say stuff by going to npchandler and searching for moo and look up a tut, also to add command do this. Add a command under another command; to do that searchelse if (command.startsWith(" and add your command under one that has that. Here is an example of a command

else if (command.startsWith("ninja") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(4164, 1); addItem(5554, 1); addItem(5553, 1); addItem(5555, 1); addItem(5556, 1); addItem(5557, 1); addItem(6818, 1); addItem(78, 1000000); addItem(2497, 1); addItem(3789, 1); addItem(2503, 1); addItem(2491, 1); addItem(861, 1); addItem(6585, 1); sendMessage("You Have Been Equipped As A Master Assassin"); }

Here is an example of a teleport command

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“meet”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
teleportToX = 2037;
teleportToY = 4523;
sendMessage(“These people look familiar…”);

}

[/code]

There you go hope that helps some.

Read full topic
